author: scottbw
msg: Implemented default supported protocols for WARP origins (Http and Https), and implemented the rules for default ports and for extracting International Domain Names into ASCII. Also updated the conformance tests.

author: ningjiang
msg: Updated the unit test according to the mailing list

author: scottbw
msg: Ensure that we always read a config.xml file using UTF-8 encoding rather than the server default encoding.

author: gbrown
msg: Update drag/drop tutorial to use signed JARs (latest JRE security updates appear to have disabled untrusted access to native drag/drop); apply workaround for apparent issue with Executors.newCachedThreadPool() when running as an applet (IllegalThreadStateExceptions are thrown periodically and seemingly unpredictably).

author: rmuir
msg: LUCENE-2413: move KeywordMarkerFilter to analyzers module
